subject: Doping (Sports)
Basketball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: J.R. Smith, who will be returning from two knee surgeries, will serve the five-game suspension by the N.B.A. once he is healthy enough to play.
snippet: J.R. Smith, who will be returning from two knee surgeries, will serve the five-game suspension by the N.B.A. once he is healthy enough to play.
